item.title: Aspirin
item.description:
Aspirin

This was one of the coolest shoots to do. Very small crew, just me, the cameraman, the producer, one agency creative and a local producer/art director. All the cast was sourced locally in Arusha. The locations are all around Lake Natron.

item.title: Second Honeymoon Trailer
item.description:
Second Honeymoon Trailer

Feel free to like and comment! Logline The seemingly perfect honeymoon of two newlyweds is disrupted by the memories of another, similar holiday. Short Synopsis Newlyweds Jesper and Agnes are spending their honeymoon at the beautiful lakeside home of Jesper's uncle Harry, deep in sun-drenched Portugal.
